main event: A UFO was observed over Paris, Texas, on May 7, 1967, for approximately 11 minutes.
interesting points: The object made a 90-degree turn at high speed and appeared to separate and come back together,The object was compared in size to a normal aircraft,It vanished instantly by moving straight up,There were no confirmed radar detections of the UFO despite initial reports,The observation included both visual and ground radar detection.
witness description: Observers from the radar facility and a resident of Paris, Texas
